None.Name: It's the shoes
None.Description: Activate to awe up to 3 enemy units within a 15m radius around Rogan. Affected units will be awestruck by his compelling presence and will not be able to fight or attack for 13 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Inspiring Leader
None.Description: Friendly units within a 15m radius will be inspired by Rogan's presence and deal 25% more damage while surrounding him.
